Text: I'm guessing from your copied description that this is the v1.0.
WinterGale, did you get the v1.1 update? Could you please post it in case you did? :)
In the game, whenever I talk to an NPC the screen just turns black? Is this some kind of bug?

Halp!

"The kid was playin' the game, havin' a real good time, and beat the first level. But then once he'd planted the first Core in the Bastion and tried to 'fly' to the next level, it'd go to the loading screen and then crash to the Finder every time.
The kid was wonderin' if any of you know what to do?"

Is there a further crack needed?

Thanks!
